DOC.brief_summary: This study compare two way people respond questionnaire health emotional well-being : computer paper pencil . We see long take use method . We also ask feel use computer answer question .
DOC.brief_title: Development Computer Assisted Survivor Screening For Adult Survivors Childhood Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: To determine feasibility use Computer Assisted Survivor Screening ( CASS ) routine screen measure survivor population . Specifically , determine patient acceptance , time completion , burden associate CASS . To examine potential utility CASS routine screening measure survivor population . To validate CASS SCL-90-R screening measure . Calculate sensitivity , specificity , positive negative predictive value , diagnostic agreement ROC curve CASS compare SCL-90 . Determine optimal cut-off score optimize agreement CASS SCL-90 .
DOC.criteria: Currently least 18 year age old 49 year age Diagnosed first malignancy age 22 Completed cancer treatment least three year prior Able complete survey instrument English Scheduled routine offtreatment followup oncology appointment Currently diseasefree receive cancer treatment History central nervous system tumor A sensory cognitive impairment would interfere completion survey Currently undergo treatment psychiatrist psychologist ( ie. , currently receive psychotherapy and/or psychotropic medication , per selfreport )
